system.description:
After you drink this potion, for the next hour your Strength score increases to match the giant whose parts were used to create it (see Table: Potion of Giant Strength).

The potion has no effect if your Strength is equal to or greater than the giantâ€™s Strength score.

Giant STR Score Rarity Cost Appearance

  1. Hill 20 Uncommon 300 gp Muddy, gray

  2. Frost 22 Rare 800 gp Transparent, viscous

  3. Stone 23 Rare 800 gp Silver, shimmering

  4. Fire 25 Rare 2,000 gp Orange, volatile

  5. Cloud 27 Very rare 5,000 gp Opaque white

  6. Storm 29 Legendary 52,500 gp Swirling black

Crafting Components:

  • body part from an appropriate Giant

  • vial of mimic essence
